h4.a: Meridian Closed for Rodeo Parade September 6

div.div: Meridian from Stewart to 7th Ave SW will be closed on Friday, September 6, starting at 8:30 am for the annual Rodeo Parade. Roads will reopen once the parade has finished. Read on...
The City of Puyallup is hosting College Appreciation Week starting at Noon on Saturday, August 31st, 2024, at the Washington State Fair. Read on...

h4.a: New EPA Requirements for Water Service Lines

div.div: The City needs your help complying with new federal EPA water system requirements. The City is required to inventory all water service line material types by October 2024. Read on...

Enroll in Puyallup Alerts, the City's official emergency alert system. Using the system, the City can send life safety information quickly to you. Sign up for alerts via text, phone and email by going to our webpage. Read on...
The City of Puyallup is hosting College Appreciation Week starting at Noon on Saturday, August 31st, 2024, at the Washington State Fair. Read on...
